#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define p printf("%d %d ", a[i], a[j]), i++, j--;
int cmpfunc(const void *a, const void *b){
	return(*(int *)a - *(int *)b);
}

int main(){
	int t, n, i; scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t-- && scanf("%d", &n)){
		int a[n], i, j;
		for(i = 0; i < n; scanf("%d", &a[i++]));
		qsort(a, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc), i = 0, j = n - 1;
		if(n & 1){while(i < j)	p printf("%d", a[i]);}
			else	while(i <= j)	p
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
